name: Preliminary Irrigation Design
description:
a. Coordinate water, power, and landscape requirements with project team as necessary.
b. Calculate tap requirements and water use.
c. Prepare preliminary irrigation plans showing water use calculations, meter locations, mainline routing, irrigation types for areas, and details.

name: Irrigation Construction Documents
description:
a. Prepare irrigation design and construction documents for irrigated areas in final planting plans.
b. Design will include piping and sprinkler layout, hydraulic analysis, irrigation schedule, and construction details.
c. Irrigation bid sheet with quantities.
